publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7619.1 Stuart McMillan: Coastguard Centre Cutsâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-7619) in the name of Alasdair Allan, insert at end ", and considers that the proposed reduction in coastguard centres will have a direct impact on maritime safety on the River Clyde, where the Clyde Coastguard is currently based at the Navy Buildings in Inverclyde, and that any cuts will thus have a detrimental effect on the local economy and employment".
S3M-7619.1 Coastguard Centre Cuts (lodged on 17 December 2010) Bill Wilson*, Bill Kidd*
